title: 6.3.2 Implement TrialService
body:
## Parent Issue
#25 - 6.3 Trial Management System

## Objective
Implement trial management service with usage tracking.

## Key Methods
- get_or_create_trial(tenant_id) - Auto-create trial on first access
- check_limit(tenant_id, dimension) - Check if action allowed
- record_usage(tenant_id, dimension, count) - Record usage
- extend_trial(tenant_id) - One-time 7-day extension
- get_trial_status(tenant_id) - Get comprehensive status for UI

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/trial.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Trial auto-created on first access
- [ ] Limits enforced correctly
- [ ] Usage recorded and persisted
- [ ] Extension works once only
- [ ] Status includes all usage metrics

## Estimated Time
3 hours
